review_title: Unprofessional management team overwork staff and treats subordinates poorly.
pros: Decent health insurance package. There are no other perks.  This is the worst employment experience I've ever had.  I do NOT recommend.  They will mislead you up front to bring you on board and then change the expectations later on.
cons: No work/life balance and management does not care about its people.  The HR department is non-existent.   The company is concerned with profits and not with educating students.  It's all about the money.
